attributes.action: Make British sign language a compulsory lesson in all schools
attributes.additional_details: because we need to raise awareness for deaf people and help them communicate better, these lessons should be very frequently as I think this is a very important thing. The government should of done this sooner.
attributes.background: I would like the government to make British sign language compulsory and very frequently in all schools, primary and secondary schools.

rejection.details:
